caption: Table 1: Evaluation of the collected publications on the types of contributions, 2017-2021.
description: This table provides a detailed breakdown of the contributions made by the publications included in the literature review, categorized by year of publication (2017-2021) and type of contribution (Propose methods, Theoretical frameworks, Analyses, Apply, Benchmark, Review).  Each publication is listed with a checkmark indicating the type(s) of contributions it makes. This allows for a clear visualization of the distribution of research efforts in the field of Algorithmic Recourse during that timeframe.

caption: Table 2: Evaluation of the collected publications on the types of contributions, 2022.
description: This table presents a detailed breakdown of the contributions made by publications in 2022 related to algorithmic recourse research.  It categorizes each publication according to several contribution types: proposing new methods, developing theoretical frameworks, performing analyses, applying the methods to real-world scenarios, benchmarking existing methods, and conducting literature reviews.  A checkmark indicates that the publication made a contribution within the specified category.

caption: Table 3: Evaluation of the collected publications on the types of contributions, 2023-2024.
description: This table shows the types of contributions (proposing methods, theoretical frameworks, analyses, applications, benchmarks, and reviews) made by the publications included in the study, categorized by year of publication (2023 and 2024).  It provides a detailed breakdown of the research focus within the selected publications.
